GameBoard - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents the game board panel where the Connect Four game is displayed and played.
GameInfo - Class in Unnamed Package
GameInfo class is a part of the Connect-4 game UI, responsible for displaying player information, game time, and other relevant game status information.
